name: aethel-engine
description: Aethel AI Engine - Superior autonomous AI platform

scripts.check:ai-ide-ts: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='cloud-ide-desktop/aethel_theia_fork/packages/ai-ide/tsconfig.json'; if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.warn('ai-ide tsconfig not present; skipping'); process.exit(0);} const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('npx -y tsc --noEmit -p '+p, {stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.build:ai-ide: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='cloud-ide-desktop/aethel_theia_fork/packages/ai-ide/tsconfig.json'; if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.warn('ai-ide tsconfig not present; skipping'); process.exit(0);} const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('npx -y tsc -p '+p, {stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.test:ai-ide: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='cloud-ide-desktop/aethel_theia_fork/packages/ai-ide/test/run-mocha.js'; if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.warn('ai-ide tests not present; skipping'); process.exit(0);} const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('npm run build:ai-ide', {stdio:'inherit'}); execSync('node '+p, {stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.test:all: npm run check:ai-ide-ts && npm run test:ai-ide && npm run test:e2e
scripts.check:syntax: npm run check:src-ts && npm run check:ai-ide-ts && npm run check:web-ts && npm run check:js-syntax
scripts.test:llm: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='src/common/llm/tests/llm-integration.test.ts'; if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.warn('script target not present; skipping: '+p); process.exit(0);} const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('npx ts-node '+p, {stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.test:browser: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='src/common/web-automation/tests/browser.test.ts'; if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.warn('script target not present; skipping: '+p); process.exit(0);} const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('npx ts-node '+p, {stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.test:trading: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='src/common/trading/tests/exchange.test.ts'; if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.warn('script target not present; skipping: '+p); process.exit(0);} const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('npx ts-node '+p, {stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.desktop:dev: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='cloud-ide-desktop/desktop-app/package.json'; if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.warn('desktop app not present; skipping'); process.exit(0);} const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('npm --prefix cloud-ide-desktop/desktop-app run dev', {stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.desktop:build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='cloud-ide-desktop/desktop-app/package.json'; if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.warn('desktop app not present; skipping'); process.exit(0);} const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('npm --prefix cloud-ide-desktop/desktop-app run build', {stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.check:syntax:root: npm run check:src-ts && npm run check:ai-ide-ts && npm run check:js-syntax
